The Kings Tower (formerly Kingsway Tower) is a 15-storey mixed-use building located at a junction on Alfred Rewane Road, Ikoyi, Lagos. It was designed by South African architects Stefan Antoni Olmesdahl Truen Architects and developed by Sky View Towers Limited. The building has twelve floors of office spaces spanning over , two floors of retail spaces covering approximately  (total site area of ), a basement and a parking podium (three above grade and one below grade) for about 343 cars. Other facilities include a restaurant and cafe. Completion finalized in 2019.
